# SEA LANGUAGE? 2

*That's just another way to......*

---

题目给的数据8个字符为一组,猜测可能是二进制,在[gchq.github.io](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=Find_/_Replace(%7B'option':'Simple%20string','string':'.'%7D,'0',true,false,true,false)Find_/_Replace(%7B'option':'Simple%20string','string':'_'%7D,'1',true,false,true,false)From_Binary('Space',8)&)将`.`替换为`0`,`_`替换为`1`,然后二进制转字符串

![image-20211202205739848](../../CTF/TFCCTF2021/Crypto/images/image-20211202205304755.png)



**flag:**`TFCCTF{w417_4_m1nu73..._7h15_1s_n07_m0rs3!!!!!r1gh7?}`
